channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NJ
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NJ

item.title: Report X-2023080581
item.description:
Report X-2023080581

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-29T21:11:32+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-01
  • City: BARRINGTON
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: DURING THE UNLOAD PROCESS THE MANAGER NOTICED THE PKG WAS WET AND PURPLE. MANAGER IMMEDICATELY TOOK PKG OVER TO THE HAZMAT CAGE. I SECURED AND VENTILATED PROPERLY. I THEN REPACKED IT INTO A YELLOW SALVAGE DRUM AND AM AWAITING THE DISPOSITION FROM PGH. DescribePack: APPROXIMATELY 1 CUP OF STAIN LEAKED OUT DUE TO A LOOSE CAP ON ONE OF THE FOUR BOTTLES. IT LEAKED OUT ONTO THE OTHER 3 BOTTLES AS WELL CAUSING THE STAIN TO BE ALL OVER ALL FOUR BOTTLES. DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: IMMEDIATELY TAKEN OVER TO HAZMAT CAGE TO BE SECURED AND REPACKED INTO A YELLOW SALVAGE DRUM AND VENTILATED PROPERLY.

Report X-2023080541

  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package found during preload, placed in red tote and brought to QA cage DescribePack: One 1gl can had a loose top. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package placed in a plastic hazmat bag and tied with zip tie to prevent fumes from escaping.

item.title: Report X-2023080524
item.description:
Report X-2023080524

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-28T18:15:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-29
  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: DURING THE OVERNIGHT SORT THE PACKAGE WAS BROUGHT TO THE HAZMAT CAGE SHOWING OBVIOUS SIGNS OF LEAKAGE. UPON FURTHER INSPECTION THE BOX CONTAINING ETHYL ALCOHOL, U.S.P WAS FOUND WITH ONE OF THE BOTTLES SLIGHTY LEAKED OUT. THEY WERE HURRIEDLY PLACED IN A SALVAGE DRUM TO BE RETURNED TO THE SHIPPER UNLESS OTHERWISE DescribePack: FAILURE OF THE PACKAGE WAS DUE TO THE CAP BEING LOOSE CAUSING 1 BOTTLE OF ETHYL ALCOHOL, U.S.P. TO BE SLIGHTY LEAKED OUT. DurationRel: 4 and MitigateEffect: THE REMAINING CONTENTS WERE PLACED IN A LINED SALAVAGE DRUM TO AWAIT DISPOSITION.

item.title: Report X-2023080523
item.description:
Report X-2023080523

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-28T18:15:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-29
  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: DURING THE OVERNIGHT SORT THE PACKAGE WAS BROUGHT TO THE HAZMAT CAGE SHOWING OBVIOUS SIGNS OF LEAKAGE. UPON FURTHER INSPECTION THE BOX CONTAINING ECOLAB GREASESTRIP PLUS WAS FOUND WITH ONE OF THE BOTTLES HALF LEAKED OUT. THEY WERE HURRIEDLY PLACED IN A SALVAGE DRUM TO BE RETURNED TO THE SHIPPER UNLESS OTHERWISE. DescribePack: FAILURE OF THE PACKAGE WAS DUE TO THE CAP BEING LOOSE CAUSING 1 BOTTLE OF GREASESTRIP PLUS TO BE HALF WAY LEAKED OUT. DurationRel: 5 and MitigateEffect: THE REMAINING CONTENTS WERE PLACED IN A LINED SALAVAGE DRUM TO AWAIT DISPOSITION

item.title: Report X-2023080292
item.description:
Report X-2023080292

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-24T18:13:50+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-21
  • City: EAST BRUNSWICK
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2023080292 SequenceEvent: Attached is the Hazmat Material Certification Brandon Burke reported hazmat spill while performing a yard check at 7:20pm Gineyra Rios reported the spill to Sabrina Dazulma, Hector Morales, and Ugo at 7:30pm John Shearin and Sabrina Dazulma checked the Hazmat Materials Certifications for all the packages on the trailer at 7:55 UN2031 and UN2789 SDS sheet indicated that a Respirator was needed. Michael Henn was called at 7:59pm Emergency Spill Response was called at 8:18am Emergency Spill Response onsite at - will update on final email Emergency Spill Response left the site at - will update on final email Trailer: #562866 Driver: Luis Gonzalez Contractor: BAL Serivices PSA/CSA: 129943 DescribePack: Not secured on the pallet DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Emergency Spill Response was called for clean up. 2. X-2023080293 SequenceEvent: Attached is the Hazmat Material Certification Brandon Burke reported hazmat spill while performing a yard check at 7:20pm Gineyra Rios reported the spill to Sabrina Dazulma, Hector Morales, and Ugo at 7:30pm John Shearin and Sabrina Dazulma checked the Hazmat Materials Certifications for all the packages on the trailer at 7:55 UN2031 and UN2789 SDS sheet indicated that a Respirator was needed. Michael Henn was called at 7:59pm Emergency Spill Response was called at 8:18am Emergency Spill Response onsite at - will update on final email Emergency Spill Response left the site at - will update on final email Trailer: #562866 Driver: Luis Gonzalez Contractor: BAL Serivices PSA/CSA: 129943 DescribePack: Not secured on the pallet DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Emergency Spill Response was called for clean up.
